Curriculum – Vitae

PROFILE
Diligent Professional having with 1 year of experience in Supplier 
Quality Assurance/ In-Process.
Academically astute with B.Tech (Mechanical) from FGIET Raebareli 
affiliated to UPTU Lucknow.
Self-motivated, hardworking and goal oriented with a high degree of 
flexibility, creativity, resourcefulness, commitment and optimism. 
. 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Jan 2016  – Till date     
Q.A Engineer – Reporting to Manager (Deptt.Head) 
M&M Machine Craft Private  Limited, Gurgaon – Haryana
      An ISO/TS 16949:2009 certified company. It manufacturers of 
Pressure Die Casting,Tubular Components,CNC Machined 
Components,Alodine Components etc. Its major customers Sunbeam 
Automobile Pvt. Ltd Gurgaon,Munjal Showa Automobile 
Ltd.Gurgaon,Sunbeam Automobile Pvt. Ltd. Alwar Rajasthan.
JOB RESPONSIBILITY
In Process Inspection as Per work Standards & under Deviation 
records.  
SPC & control chart  implementation & monitoring.  
Daily rejection verification & root cause analysis of defect & CAPA 
tracking & closing.
Co-ordination with Production & PPC to meet dispatched  plan as per 
schedule. 
Present Monthly summary of defects during monthly Management 
review meetings.
Incoming Inspection of job work & Plating Material as Per work 
Standards.
Preparing Reports on a daily and weekly basis to report the quality 
improvements and initiatives taken.
Recording of Rejection and Root cause analysis of Defect.
Inspection of Pre Dispatch Inspection Report ( P.D.I.R )
Daily morning meeting with line inspector regarding to reduces 
defects.
 Customer Complaint HandlingHandling customer complaints, doing root cause analysis through 
different quality tools like 5 Why and Fish-Bone Analysis.
Responsible for generating Quality Alert regarding customer 
complaints. 
Take Corrective action on Customer Quality Problems.
Analysis on Customer returns Parts with help Quality Head.
SUMMER TRAINING / PROJECT
Four Weeks Industrial Training from BHEL PSNR(2X500MW Project UPRVUNL 
ANPARA)
Project summits in final year on Hydraulic Arm using syringe.
EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATION

UPTU, Lucknow with 72%.
Passed Diploma (Elex.) in 2011 from FGP Raebareli, Affiliated from 
BTEUP Lucknow with 83%.
Passed 10+2 Examination in 2007 from Dayanad Inter College, Bindki 
With 63% marks in UP Board Allahabad.
Passed 10th Examination in 2005 from Dayanad Inter College, Bindki 
With 64% marks in UP Board Allahabad.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
